tamdem.title: Flying, a dream!
tamdem.description: Everyone has looked at the sky with the desire to fly… With us, it's possible! Every day of the year, professional pilots make your dream come true. Flights take place from Ruinettes or Croix de Cœur. After 20 to 25 minutes of an unforgettable flight, your pilot will land you at Châble, and you’ll never look at the sky the same way again.
tamdem.description_box: On request, the pilot will take some photos and videos.

who_are_we.title: Who Are We?
who_are_we.description: Our team consists of 2 instructors, Sébastien Bruchez (aka 'Sun') and me, Nicolas Terrettaz. But that's not all, we also have ONE more instructor, Yael Margelisch. This joyful team is here to make your dream of FLYING a reality.
